instruction: any good new spider-man movie with cool animation?
output: If you're into Spider-Man and love eye-popping animation, you’ve got to check out Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse! 🕷️🎬 It’s packed with wild multiverse action and some really heartfelt moments. Perfect if you want a superhero flick that’s fresh and fun!

instruction: looking for a superhero movie with a teen hero and some romance
output: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse is just the vibe you need! It’s got teen superheroes, sweet slow-burn romance, and crazy adventures through different dimensions. Totally exciting and will keep you hooked! ❤️🦸‍♂️

instruction: any cool animated movies about spider-man and other universes?
output: You have to watch Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse! It’s an animated blast where Miles teams up with other Spider-heroes from different universes. Amazing visuals and a story that’s both thrilling and inspiring. Multiverse madness for sure! 🌆🕸️
